posts.title: Exploring Complex Hierarchies with Packed Radial Tree
posts.abstract: An interactive visualization that renders hierarchical datasets as elegantly-arranged circular nodes in a radial layout. Explore the Unified Astronomy Thesaurus with this custom-designed visualization featuring packed circles, collision resolution, and navigation.

posts.title: Understanding Embeddings Through Epic Fantasy
posts.abstract: A journey through the world of embeddings, illustrated with epic fantasy literature and interactive visualizations. Learn how embeddings transform text into numerical vectors that capture meaning and relationships, using examples from The Wheel of Time, Mistborn, and other fantasy series.

posts.title: Vistrates: A Versatile Tool for Data Analytics in the World of On-Device Intelligence
posts.abstract: Introducing a platform for many activities in data exploration between multiple users on heterogeneous devices. Vistrates is web-based and collaborative by nature, thus supporting data analysis anywhere, anytime, and by anyone.
posts.name: vistrates

posts.title: Elastic Documents: Reading Data-Rich Documents with Generated Visualizations
posts.abstract: Linking text and tables through contextual visualizations in data-rich documents improves reading comprehension. Our user evaluations have shown the power of this new approach in summarization and comprehension of data-rich documents.
posts.name: elasticdocs

posts.title: When David Meets Goliath: Using Smartwatches and Large Displays Together for Data Analysis
posts.abstract: New conceptual framework developed at University of Maryland and Technische Universit√§t Dresden helps utilize multiple devices together for visual data analysis.
posts.name: DG

posts.title: Understanding Data by Having Computers and Humans Work Together
posts.abstract: Introducing a new tool called DataSite for proactive visual exploration using insight-based recommendations to help analysts easily get started with data analysis.
posts.name: datasite

posts.title: Bridging Physical and Digital Worlds: When Your Body Is Your Tool, Data Becomes Accessible
posts.abstract: New interaction models developed at University of Maryland and University of Manitoba utilize body and hand movement to perform data analysis on large wall-sized displays.
posts.name: proxemiclens

posts.title: TimeFork: Exploring Multiple Futures in the Stock Market with Generative Models
posts.abstract: A new tool called TimeFork uses interactive graphics and state-of-the-art statistical models to allow traders to investigate multiple parallel universes for predicting the stock market.
posts.name: timefork
